column1: BASED  ON  THE  INFORMATION  PROVIDED  TO  THE  COMPANY  AS  AT  1 APRIL  2019,  THERE  WERE  10,165,720,497  SHARES  HELD  IN  THE
HANDS OF THE PUBLIC, REPRESENTING 62.85% OF THE TOTAL NUMBER OF ISSUED SHARES OF THE COMPANY. ACCORDINGLY, RULE 723 OF
THE CATALIST RULES HAS BEEN COMPLIED WITH.
